title: On Behalf of Nautilus Players Everywhere
body:
I thank you.

His early game clears have been improved by a very wide margin, and he is a much better tank than that of he he was before. His new E allows him to be a much bigger threat in teamfights, increasing his damage and overall cc output by the very gracious amount. There was no tradeoff, this was a straight buff, and you guys handled it excellently. I can clear just as fast as Lee Dong in the midgame, meaning I can actually keep up in farm.  Can't wait to test out Zac!

Ya did good Riot. Ya did good

replies.body: *slightly whistling as the sarcasm flies over the heads of the masses
